Hi. Pleased to meet you!

I'm Laura.

I recently graduated with a Professional Bachelor's Degree in Web design, Writing and Web development.

During my studies and my work experiences, I've acquired a variety of skills that allowed me to be versatile. I've worked with agencies and companies alike, and I've delved into different kinds of work and design: Photography, Graphic design, Branding, UX/UI Design, Web development, Print etc.

I have a passion for all forms of design. I like to experiment during my free time and merge my passion with my hobbies: gaming, K-pop and music.

I have a background in Business, as I also have a Bachelor in Marketing & Communication. After graduating, I realized I was more suited for more creative endeavors. However, this allows me to have a more strategic vision of my current work.

Thank you for taking the time to read more about me! :)
